title: Patient Care Practical Competency Strengthening: Online Learning Based on Concrete-Abstract Pedagogy for Geometry and Algebra Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can connect geometric problems to real-world cases (e.g., building design) and represent them in at least three concrete models
Learners can solve algebraic equations by converting them into physical manipulatives (e.g., algebra tiles) and digital simulations

Learners propose creative solutions to three or more real-life problems by applying geometric/algebraic concepts to medical data analysis scenarios (e.g., tracking patient symptom patterns, calculating medication dosages) during a 4–6 week project-based assessment, and achieve an "Excellent" rating in at least four of the five evaluation rubric criteria (problem definition, mathematical modeling, feasibility, creativity, and result analysis).

constraints.accessibility: 화면 낭독 프로그램 호환 가능한 웹 콘텐츠

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
